book.synopsis: A star-struck fan recounts the story of how her dream came true when Bette Davis came to dinner and had to stay in her suburban home for four weeks due to a hotel strike in Manhattan. Original.
book.title_long: Me and Jezebel: When Bette Davis Came for Dinner -- And Stayed ... And Stayed ... And Stayed ... And ...
book.dimensions: Height: 5 Inches, Length: 7 Inches, Weight: 0.3 Pounds, Width: 1 Inches
